subject: Mental Health
title: Anxiety and Aging
description: Learn Anxiety and Aging in one minute.

hook.text: Anxiety doesn't retire when you do. Older adults face unique triggers.

buildup.text: Health decline, loss of independence, and bereavement create new fears.

discovery.text: Anxiety in seniors is often misdiagnosed as dementia or depression.

twist.text: Medications for other conditions can trigger or worsen anxiety symptoms.

climax.text: Only a fraction of anxious older adults receive appropriate treatment.

punchline.text: Age changes the fear, not the suffering.

quiz.question: Why is anxiety often missed in older adults?
options: It's misdiagnosed as dementia or depression
